text: Us sa-ath (hour/Qayamat) ka ilm Allah hi ki taraf raajeh hota hai, wahi un saare phalon (fruits) ko jaanta hai jo apne shagufon (coverings/sheath) mein se nilakte hain, usi ko maaloom hai ke kaunsi maada (female) hamila (conceive) hui hai aur kisne baccha janaa (give birth) hai. Phir jis roz woh in logon ko pukarega ke kahan hain mere woh shareek? Yeh kahenge, “hum arz kar chuke hain, aaj hum mein se koi iski gawahi dene wala nahin hai.”
